topic.title: Step7. Enable IP Forwarding on SBC
topic.shortdesc: Enable IP Forwarding on SBC network interface to forward network traffic from YMP virtual machine.

ol.li: In the search box at the top of the portal, enter Network interface in the search box. When Route tables appear in the search results, select it.
On the Network Interfaces page, select the SBC network interface.
In the Settings section, click IP configurations.
Click Enabled to enable IP forwarding.
